languages.text: "Я не сомневаюсь в этом. Раскаяние — лишь подготовка к искупительным мукам души, а не замена им".
"I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."
languages.original_text: "Я не сомневаюсь в этом. Раскаяние — лишь подготовка к искупительным мукам души, а не замена им".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance serves as preparation for the salvific torment of the soul, not its replacement."
"I'm sure it does. Repentance serves as preparation for the salvific torment of the soul, not its replacement."
"I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."
"I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."
"I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

languages.text: “我相信会是这样的。忏悔仅仅是为了让我们的灵魂做好准备，迎接充满痛苦的救赎，它并不能替代救赎本身。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: “我相信会是这样的。忏悔仅仅是为了让我们的灵魂做好准备，迎接充满痛苦的救赎，它并不能替代救赎本身。”

languages.text: «Seguro que sí. El arrepentimiento solo nos prepara para el tormento salvador del alma, no lo suplanta».
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: «Seguro que sí. El arrepentimiento solo nos prepara para el tormento salvador del alma, no lo suplanta».

languages.text: 「輝いでいるでしょう。リペンタンスとは魂の救済的苦悩のための準備であって、それに取って代わるものではありません」
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: 「輝いでいるでしょう。リペンタンスとは魂の救済的苦悩のための準備であって、それに取って代わるものではありません」

languages.text: "Mit Sicherheit. Reue bereitet uns auf die erlösende Qual der Seele nur vor, sie ersetzt sie nicht."
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Sicherheit. Reue bereitet uns auf die erlösende Qual der Seele nur vor, sie ersetzt sie nicht."

languages.text: « Je suis sûr que c'est le cas. La repentance nous prépare au tourment salvateur de l'âme, il ne nous en exempte pas. »
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis sûr que c'est le cas. La repentance nous prépare au tourment salvateur de l'âme, il ne nous en exempte pas. »

languages.text: "Eminim yanıyordur. Tövbe; bizi ruhun çekeceği arınma acısının hazırlar, tövbe edince acıdan kurtulunmaz."
languages.original_text: "I'm sure it does. Repentance but primes us for the salvific torment of the soul, it does not supplant it."

traits.locale_text: "Eminim öyle oluyordur. Tövbe, ruhun çekeceği arındırıcı acılar için bir başlangıçtır, onların yerine geçebilen bir şey değildir."
